overview: "Bloggers and Roads" is an honest story of travel in Russia in the format of a travel-vlog. A company of very different bloggers goes on a journey to see what people live in the villages and small towns of our country. Without written cues and a clear plan, they plunge headlong into adventures.  Nastya Ivleeva, Eldar Jarakhov, Danya Milokhin, Yulia Gavrilina, Cherocky and Vital Parapatronov disconnected from the bustle of the capital to live in the "here and now" format for a week.  They will invite themselves to visit the locals, arrange a village drift, work on the farm and even go on a real hike in the wild!  We guarantee-made with the soul.
title: Bloggers and roads
